name: com.nftport.nftport
description:
NFTPort.xyz unity extension provides tools and features to integrate NFT's crosschain at lightning speed in Unity.

 https://github.com/nftport/nftport-unity.git

samples.description: Contains sample showcasing get components for : NFTs owned by an account and NFTs of a contract
Contains sample showcasing easing minting a file via a URL
Download assets like NFTImage, Video, Audio etc from IPFS or Web2, Use in conjunction with NFTMetaData
Get Address of players wallet connect with events
Showcases game sample to mint custom NFT's ,  connect wallet and more
